params.account: The address of the account for which the available credit is being queried.

returns.availableCredit: The available credit of the queried account.

params.amount: The amount of credit to be added to the caller's account.

returns.totalAvailableCredit: The updated available credit of the caller's account.

params.account: The address of the account for which the available credit is being increased.
params.amount: The amount of credit to be added to the account.

returns.totalAvailableCredit: The updated available credit of the caller's account.

params.amount: The amount of credit to be withdrawn.

returns.totalAvailableCredit: The updated available credit of the caller's account.

availableCredit(address).notice: Returns the available credit for a given account in the FeeBank contract.

deposit(uint256).notice: Increases the caller's available credit by the specified amount.

depositFor(address,uint256).notice: Increases the specified account's available credit by the specified amount.

depositForWithPermit(address,uint256,byt.notice: Increases the specified account's available credit by a specified amount with permit.

depositWithPermit(uint256,bytes).notice: Increases the caller's available credit by a specified amount with permit.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraws a specified amount of credit from the caller's account.

withdrawTo(address,uint256).notice: Withdraws a specified amount of credit to the specified account.

returns._0: The instance of the FeeBank contract.

params.account: The address of the account for which the available credit is being queried.

returns._0: The available credit of the queried account.

params.account: The address of the account for which the available credit is being decreased.
params.amount: The amount by which the available credit will be decreased.

returns.allowance: The updated available credit of the specified account.

params.account: The address of the account for which the available credit is being increased.
params.amount: The amount by which the available credit will be increased.

returns.allowance: The updated available credit of the specified account.

FEE_BANK().notice: Returns the instance of the FeeBank contract.

availableCredit(address).notice: Returns the available credit for a given account.

decreaseAvailableCredit(address,uint256).notice: Decreases the available credit of a given account by a specified amount.

increaseAvailableCredit(address,uint256).notice: Increases the available credit of a given account by a specified amount.
